nodes.bodyText: can u check whether we need to add provided scope to this? Otherwise wouldn't the war bundle the graphQL jar as well?
the message seems to be too long and a bit confusing. "Missing definitionType parameter" would be sufficient.
what about "Error while validating the endpoint URL definition of the new registry entry with registry id"
shouldn't we change the order here?

The order does not matter here. It is handled before calling this validation method.
This check is only to determine where the content is pulled.
by looking at this method only, one would get the impression that the URL is given priority. So shall we.change the order with a comment?
yeah. no harm in changing that. I ll will
